Middleware¶

Middlewares for watchdog app.

class watchdog.middleware.ErrorLogMiddleware(get_response=None)¶

Middleware to capture exceptions occurred at runtime for a request and log it into database if error logging is enabled through settings.WATCHDOG_ERRORLOG_ENABLED
